sentence: She's not alone: A similar situation unfolded when freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) called Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy a thug.? And it goes to show that the words of any lawmaker even if they don't represent the majority of views in the party can be weaponized by malign actors in an already gruesome war.
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene's comments on "Nazis in Ukraine" have been cited by Russian media. They're using them to help justify their invasion of Ukraine.
